issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

fields.summary: LevelDB can get to a corrupt state when using XA transactions

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Server craches during work. It worked correctly for a few days before.

{code}

fields.summary: LevelDB client crashes when committing transaction
fields.environment:
* Windows Server 2008 R2
* java 1.6.0_38 64bit
* levelDB storage with default settings

comments.body: Can you provide a test case that reproduces this?

Unfortunately I can't. We don't know the scenario to reproduce it.
There were few queues with average throughtput of 1000 messages per day.
LevelDB is deprecated and no longer maintained.
